title: The Hobbit: There and Back Again - Trilogy Fan Edit
description:
This fan edit combines all three Hobbit film into one movie, taking out everything that isn't in the book(mostly). Obviously there are elements and characters that aren't in the book, that I left in order to keep the film coherent and dynamic. But there isn't Radagast, no Dol Guldur, no romance(Tauriel), no gravity defying moments, no absurd fight scenes... I tried to be absolutely economical.
This fan edit combines all three Hobbit film into one movie, taking out everything that isn't in the book(mostly). Obviously there are elements and characters that aren't in the book, that I left in order to keep the film coherent and dynamic. But there isn't Radagast, no Dol Guldur, no romance(Tauriel), no gravity defying moments, no absurd fight scenes... I tried to be absolutely economical.

Equivalent to the length of one extended edition Lord of the Rings ~four hours~

00:00:00 Unexpected, 01:45:38, Desolation, 02:53:37 Battle of Five 

As the disclaimer states, this film edit ASSUMES you own the three Hobbit films. I do not condone piracy.

If you find any little problems or want me to tweak something please send me a message. This is only the first version. I'm open to feedback. 

Also I would like to note that Peter Jackson is my favorite director. I have seen nearly all his films.(I think except for that weird puppet one.) Either way, I religiously view the extended edition Lotr every year. I also went to every midnight showing for the Hobbit films. So this is in no way a better version. PJ is king. But instead a trimmed down homage. 

This is only publicly shared for people who feel the same way I do about the Hobbit films. Which is... they are a little indulgent.
